attributes.action: Permenant Pedestrian Crossing For Croesty & Pencoed Comp
attributes.additional_details:
With our Lolly Pop lady gone and the council unable to fulfil the role , even when there are sometimes 2 lolly pop ladies at other schools close by , it is only a matter of time before one of our children are hit by cars or in the worse case scenario , there will be a fatality .

We cannot comprehend why the council have not prioritised the safety of Coychurch road with The two largest schools in Pencoed wanting to cross there twice a day .

We petition the local council to change this with immediate effect before one of our children suffers the consequences of the dangers of no crossings .
